name: Moccasin
description: You cheerful mountain dweller, you are a proud and strong as a rock, as well as fashionable and stylish as the Gucci. Colorful platformer with an interesting plot and not repeatable graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
